name: Genin A
text: Find it! It's been seen around here somewhere!

name: Genin B
text: Got it!!
The Taimanin ran past us while having a pointed exchange.
It seemed like the Taimanin had already cast their net across every part of town.

name: Asagi
text: ...Seems like the coast is clear somehow.

name: Me
text: Yeah, I figured we'd be safe here.
Asagi-san and I (the boar) emerged from the shadow of a gatepost after the Taimanin had run off.
We had been hiding on the grounds of Gosha Academy.
We had escaped the Taimanin pursuing us by entering the school grounds, which were empty because of the New Year holidays.

name: Asagi
text: But how did you know about this place?

name: Me
text: Huh? What do you mean?
Asagi-san questioned me suspiciously.

name: Asagi
text: I mean, this is a school for Taimanin. How did you know about this place?

name: Me
text: Oh, about that... The truth is, I'm a student here in my dimension.
I pointed at the academy building behind me.
Asagi-san and I hid behind the school's outer walls and cautiously started to proceed.

name: Asagi
text: You're a student here? ...I see, that explains why you know about the Taimanin.

name: Me
text: Yeah, and in my dimension, you're the academy's headmistress.

name: Asagi
text: H-Headmistress!? Oh... so that's why you called me "sensei" earlier...?

name: Asagi
text: But wait... I distanced myself from Gosha Academy... and I mean, I'm still a student, so...?

name: Me
text: Wh-Who knows...?
Things like one's circumstances and age must have been different depending on the dimension.

name: Me
text: Oh, Asagi-san, more importantlyー
The whole dimension thing was too much to wrap my head around, and even if I tried thinking about it there was no conclusion in sight.
I changed the subject and asked Asagi-san about something else.

name: Me
text: Asagi-san, don't you have any wishes?

name: Asagi
text: Wishes...?

name: Me
text: I mean, from what you were saying earlier, it felt like you were willing to give up the power of the luck so I can go back home...

name: Me
text: And I would feel guilty if there was something you really wanted.

name: Asagi
text: Hmm... I don't think I have anything in particular that I want.

name: Me
text: R-Really...?
Asagi-san responded flatly, as if she were perfectly content.

name: Asagi
text: Well, it's not like I don't have anything I'd like to do... but that's something I should just make happen on my own.

name: Me
text: True.
That was something I really wanted all those guys chasing after me to hear as well.

name: Asagi
text: Oh, but if I could make any wish come true, there's one thingー
ーHaha, a wish!? That would be to fight a thrilling opponent of course!?
There was a sudden shout.
We had tried to hide ourselves and proceed carefully, but a woman leading a unit of Taimanin was now blocking our path.

name: Me
text: Ugh!? They found us!?

name: Asagi
text: ...It can't be helped. Looking like that, you can only go unnoticed for so long.
While we braced ourselves, the Taimanin unit spread out in an attempt and surrounded us.
And then the woman leading them triumphantly introduced herselfー

name: Sanada Homura
text: Sanada Homura, Captain of the Fire Art Squad's Third Division is here!!!

name: Homura
text: How happy this makes me, Igawa Asagi! To have someone as intriguing as you as my opponentー!!
She flashed the tip of a long, flaming spear at me and Asagi-san.

name: Me
text: ーSanada Homura, hm?
I searched my memory for that name.
In a way, she was a very famous Taimanin.
Captain of the Fire Art Squad's Third Division, Sanada Homura.
She was an incredibly skilled fighter, but fighting was all she thought about.
A battle maniac, who was nominally a Taimaninー

name: Homura
text: Well then, let's go for the gusto! I'm all fired up for the New Year!!!
